X.iv.2.B.6.b
.
Considering the Conclusions of Law of the Court
It is the policy of VA to give careful consideration to the findings of fact and conclusions of law of the court in determining the rights of the claimant to the benefit claimed.
However, the decisions of the VAÂ Secretary are final on matters of compensation, pension, and DIC.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B  - Considering Eligibility When Homicide Is Involved
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
